description: Have golden crumbed chicken tenderloins with mash and veggies on the dinner table in 30 minutes. It's as easy as it gets.
name: Almond-Crusted Tenders With Honey Mustard Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 475g Woolworths roasted garlic mash, heated, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Combine almonds, breadcrumbs and paprika in a shallow bowl. Place flour on a plate. Combine egg and 1 tbs cold water in a second shallow bowl.

Coat chicken in flour, then egg and breadcrumb mixture. Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook chicken, in 2 batches, for 4 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Cover to keep warm.
Meanwhile, combine honey, mustard, mayonnaise and lemon juice in a small bowl.
Cook vegetables in a medium saucepan of boiling water for 4 minutes or until heated through. Drain. Serve chicken with vegetables, mash seasoned with pepper, dipping sauce and lemon wedges.
